name: possible
content:
possible adjective
(CAN ACHIEVE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 able to be done or achieved, or able to exist: I can't get it all done by Friday - it's just not possible. Is it possible to buy tickets in advance? They got as far as was humanly possible (= as far as anyone could have) before turning back. Opposite
impossible as much, quickly, soon, etc. as possible
A2 as much, quickly, soon, etc. as something can happen or be done: Please take your seats as quickly as possible.
